name: Phish Data
overview: Comprehensive metadata provider for Phish concert videos using the Phish.net API
description: This plugin provides rich metadata for your Phish concert video collection by integrating with the Phish.net API. Features include comprehensive show information with setlists, community ratings from reviews, venue details, band member profiles, and multi-source image provider for venue and show-specific photos. Perfect for organizing and enriching your Phish video library with official show data, fan ratings, and beautiful imagery.

versions.changelog:
## Jellyfin Phish Data Plugin v1.4.4.1

### üîß HOTFIX - Plugin Image ZIP Structure

- **FIXED**: Corrected ZIP file structure for plugin images to work properly
- **Technical**: Files now at root level of ZIP instead of subdirectory
- **Result**: Plugin images should now display correctly in Jellyfin UI

This is a hotfix for v1.4.4.0 to resolve the plugin image display issue.

## Jellyfin Phish Data Plugin v1.4.4.0

### ‚úÖ MAJOR FIXES - Plugin Images & Configuration

#### üñºÔ∏è Plugin Image Display Fix (Issue #14)
- **FIXED**: Plugin images now display correctly in all 3 Jellyfin UI locations:
  - ‚úÖ Plugin Catalog
  - ‚úÖ Plugin Details/Update Screen
  - ‚úÖ My Plugins Screen
- **Technical**: Switched from non-working Plugin.cs methods to proper manifest-based approach
- **Key Change**: Uses `imagePath` instead of `imageUrl` for local file serving

#### üßπ Configuration Cleanup (Issue #19)
- **Removed Non-Functional Settings**: Cleaned up configuration options that didn't work:
  - Removed: PreferOfficialReleases, IncludeJamCharts, CacheDurationHours
  - Removed: DisableLocalCache, EnableDebugLogging, IncludeSetlistInDescription
- **Result**: Much cleaner configuration UI showing only the working API Key setting

#### üè∑Ô∏è Plugin Branding Fix (Issue #20)
- **Consistent Naming**: Plugin now shows as 'Phish Data' everywhere
- **Clean UI**: Removed unnecessary API Documentation link from settings

### Core Features (Unchanged)
- Smart filename parsing for show identification
- Complete setlists with proper transitions and formatting
- Rich show information from Phish.net API
- Venue details and location metadata
- Community ratings from Phish.net reviews
- Clean text encoding for show notes
- Band member metadata support

This release focuses on fixing long-standing UI issues and providing a much cleaner user experience.

## Jellyfin Phish Data Plugin v1.3.0

## Jellyfin Phish Data Plugin v1.2.9

A comprehensive metadata provider for Phish concert videos:
- Smart filename parsing for show identification
- Complete setlists with proper transitions
- Rich show information from Phish.net API
- Venue details and location metadata
- Proper external links to Phish.net show pages
- Clean text encoding for show notes
- Band member metadata support

Install via Jellyfin plugin catalog or manual installation.
